work.summary: Working on efficient AI models for environmental and medical applications.
highlights: Developed applied AI solutions for data pattern analysis across diverse domains including healthcare, environmental monitoring, and agriculture.
Produce research publications and contribute to conferences and journal publications
Develop code and manage version control to ensure integrity, track changes, and support team collaboration via Bitbucket
Attend regular project meetings and provide updates via project management platforms such as Jira and Confluence to manage team tasks, track project progress, and support team collaboration
Coordinate the ICV Reading Group to promote continuous learning and cross-team collaboration.
Supervise PhD student by setting clear research milestones and providing guidance toward achieving publication-focused outcomes.
